Class ArchiveServerAsyncConfig

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.configs.ArchiveServerAsyncConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.AsyncConfigurer
@Configuration @EnableAsync public class ArchiveServerAsyncConfig extends Object implements org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.AsyncConfigurer

This class is the asynchronous configuration for the Spring Boot backend server.

This class implements AsyncConfigurer to standardize async execution settings and async exception handling settings.

This class uses the following settings from the application.properties file to configure itself:

  • archiveServer.async.executor.corePoolSize
  • archiveServer.async.executor.maxPoolSize
  • archiveServer.async.executor.queueCapacity
  • archiveServer.async.executor.threadNamePrefix

All class attributes correspond to their archiveServer.async.executor counterpart.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Integer
    corePoolSize
    This attribute specifies the primary number of cores to run before placing new tasks in queue.
    private Integer
    maxPoolSize
    This attribute specifies the maximum number of cores that can be run if the async task queue becomes full.
    private Integer
    queueCapacity
    This attribute specifies the capacity of the async task waiting queue.
    private String
    threadNamePrefix
    This attribute specifies the thread name prefix to use for naming async threads.

  • Field Details

    • corePoolSize

      @Value("${archiveServer.async.executor.corePoolSize}") private Integer corePoolSize

      This attribute specifies the primary number of cores to run before placing new tasks in queue.

    • maxPoolSize

      @Value("${archiveServer.async.executor.maxPoolSize}") private Integer maxPoolSize

      This attribute specifies the maximum number of cores that can be run if the async task queue becomes full.

      If this number is reached and queue capacity is filled, then new tasks are simply dropped.

    • queueCapacity

      @Value("${archiveServer.async.executor.queueCapacity}") private Integer queueCapacity

      This attribute specifies the capacity of the async task waiting queue.

    • threadNamePrefix

      @Value("${archiveServer.async.executor.threadNamePrefix}") private String threadNamePrefix

      This attribute specifies the thread name prefix to use for naming async threads.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveServerAsyncConfig

      public ArchiveServerAsyncConfig()

  • Method Details

    • getAsyncExecutor

      @Bean(name="archiveServerAsyncExecutor") public Executor getAsyncExecutor()

      This method returns a ThreadPoolTaskExecutor singleton bean that is customized using class attributes.

      Specified by:
      getAsyncExecutor in interface org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.AsyncConfigurer
      Returns:
      ThreadPoolTaskExecutor with custom configuration.

    • getAsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler

      @Bean public org.springframework.aop.interceptor.AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler getAsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler()

      This method returns a custom AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler made for the archive server. See documentation for ArchiveServerAsyncExceptionHandler for more details.

      Specified by:
      getAsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler in interface org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.AsyncConfigurer
      Returns:
      Archive Server's AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler implementation.
